name: Halloween Forever
description: Something mysterious is happening in the pumpkin patch this Halloween! You control Pumpkin Man, a humanoid pumpkin thing animated by occult forces on a quest to discover why things are so creepy. And you vomit candy corn.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 10 MB available space
